thread.title: 3 days in Paris
thread.title_full: 3 days in Paris - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jacq628
title: 3 days in Paris
text:
Awesome movie themes design-- each floor features a French movie star and the room is decorated with their famous film theme.
Great service -- hotel staff are very helpful in booking us restaurants and giving recommendations.
Good location -- near metro stations, Velib bike rental just across the street, uber to many places within 6-11â‚¬. Will recommend to friends. Morning jogs easily bring you to Musee du Louvre and Jardin des Tuileries. Will recommend to friends !
